sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Autoconf-&autoconf-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm grep: fgrep, grep m4: m4 make: make mawk: mawk sed: sed sh-utils: echo, expr, hostname, sleep, uname texinfo: install-info textutils: cat, tr
